izzy.classification.sensitivity¶

izzy.classification.sensitivity(y_true, y_pred, sample_weights=None)¶

Compute the recall (synonyms: sensitivity, hit rate, true positive rate)

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_pred (ArrayLike) – Predicted outcomes

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight for observations

Returns

Recall for each class

Return type

dict
